scripts.build:lib:web: rm -rf ./dist/web && wasm-pack build --release --target web --scope r4ai --out-dir=./dist/web && jq '.name = "@r4ai/typst-ast-web"' ./dist/web/package.json > ./dist/web/package.json.tmp && mv ./dist/web/package.json.tmp ./dist/web/package.json
scripts.build:lib:node: rm -rf ./dist/node && wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --scope r4ai --out-dir=./dist/node && jq '.name = "@r4ai/typst-ast-node"' ./dist/node/package.json > ./dist/node/package.json.tmp && mv ./dist/node/package.json.tmp ./dist/node/package.json
scripts.build:lib: pnpm run build:lib:web && pnpm run build:lib:node
